description: This file implements platform-dependent and general utility functions for the Query Interface Object in the ANSC framework, including the creation function `AnscCreateQueryInterface`. It contains licensing information, module details, and the implementation of a factory function for creating a Query Interface object.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE AnscCreateQueryInterface(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved)
methods.description: Creates and returns a new Query Interface Object by calling the internal creation function `AnscQioCreate` with provided context handles.
